div.p: The codes that describe whether or not the patient has arrived at the specified location for the encounter.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-arrivalStatus

description.value: The codes that describe whether or not the patient has arrived at the specified location for the encounter.
